title: MOOC-Based Graduate Certification Program in Social Sciences: Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining MOOC platforms with face-to-face sessions on personal devices, requiring structured certification while allowing voluntary learner participation

learning_goals: Complete 80%+ of core social science content in MOOCs.
Apply MOOC learnings to real-world cases in face-to-face workshops with 90%+ participation.
Score 70+ points on final assessments by integrating MOOC and in-person instructional knowledge.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
